QuestData.Title: Unplug L'ghorek
QuestData.Description: L'ghorek is the ancient that rests upon the shelf across from us. It is being controlled and its life energies slowly consumed by something immense beneath us.$B$BThere is a cave known as the Undershell down below L'ghorek. In that cave are three powerful ogre magi that are maintaining a ritual connecting the thing below with the ancient. You must kill these three to disconnect L'ghorek.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must slay each of those ogre magi to stop their rituals and disconnect L'ghorek from the one below.
QuestData.RewardText: Now that you have unplugged L'ghorek, we must attempt to make contact with it. I can sense that the ancient yet lives, but only barely.
